articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Congratulations to Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Congratulations to Lao President 
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Choummaly Saynasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of Laos, on his 75th birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations and comradely greetings to you on your 75th birthday.
					
					 I am pleased that the Lao people under the LPRP headed by you have dynamically turned out in the struggle to achieve the socio-economic development of the country in hearty response to the decision of its 9th congress.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you greater success in your responsible work for the development of your party and the prosperity of the country and good health, believing that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and countries would grow stronger in the common struggle for socialism against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets French Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets French Delegation
						
  Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the French group for the study of the DPRK consisting of senators from various political parties at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 The delegation is led by Jean-Claude Frecon, senator from the Socialist Party and chairman of the group of the Senate.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Acquaint Himself with Work at Komdok Mining Complex
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Acquaint Himself with Work at Komdok Mining Complex 
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Choe Yong Rim acquainted himself with the work at the Komdok Mining Complex on the spot. 
					 He went round major production processes of the complex including the crushing, grinding and flotation plants and organized a consultative meeting of officials concerned. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of stepping up the modernization of the production process at the complex, the nation's leading mineral producer, and increasing the production of mineral through massive mineral mining and massive mineral processing and keeping the production going at a high rate even in the rainy season. 
					
					 It called on the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions to take measures to sufficiently supply electricity, equipment and materials necessary for its management and operation.

articles.title: KPA to Take Thousand-fold Revenge on Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
KPA to Take Thousand-fold Revenge on Lee Myung Bak Group
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army issued the following statement Friday in denunciation of the hideous crimes committed by the south Korean group of traitors recently:
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors kicked up much fuss after hurling puppet military hooligans into drill grounds in various parts of south Korea including Yangju and Inchon City, Kyonggi Province, to display slogans and posters slandering the socialist system in the DPRK. Not content with this, they staged such rowdyism as setting up a target and daring fire at it, a thrice-cursed criminal act of hurting the supreme dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 This is nothing but hysteric spasm hard to imagine with a normal brain and a height of confrontation with compatriots, action shocking all the Koreans.
					
					 Last year the group instigated hooligans to shell at a DPRK flag as a target, sparking off a strong uproar. The recent hideous provocation is a never-to-be pardoned treason.
					
					 There were in the south "Yusin" dictator who earned an ill fame for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and a military fascist man-hunter who made the nation shudder. But they dared not hurt the supreme dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 They knew very well that everything between the north and the south including the bilateral relations is bound to collapse if they challenge the DPRK as its people consider its supreme dignity as the dignity and honor common to the nation and turn out as one to protect it even if the sky falls and the earth breaks apart. 
					
					 The Lee group betrayed without hesitation its true colors as maniacs keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen who would make even the successive fascists blush and as gangsters ignorant of even elementary ethics and morality. 
					
					 Upon hearing the news of the above-said rowdyism, different social circles of south Korea are stunned by the extremely awful hideous provocation committed by the group which no longer wants to remain human beings and are branding it as "a blatant challenge" unprecedented in the history of inter-Korean relations and "an unheard-of politically motivated provocation" to spark off resistance of all Koreans. 
					
					 Much upset by this, the Lee group is pretending to know about it for the first time and the puppet military warmongers are staging such poor farce as floating the story that "it was an "individual action." The group, however, can never shirk the responsibility for its treason.  
					
					 The General Staff of the KPA clarifies the following stand, reflecting the towering resentment of the KPA and people against the hideous provocation committed by the group and their unanimous will to take a thousand-fold revenge upon it:     
					
					1. The south Korean puppet authorities should take a measure for immediately meting out a stern punishment to the prime movers who committed the above-said most hideous crimes against the nation. There is no room in this land for those who did harm to the absolute authority of the supreme headquarters of the DPRK even a bit.
					
					 The puppet authorities should take an immediate step to punish in the name of the nation traitor Lee Myung Bak who spearheaded the campaign for inciting hostility toward the DPRK as soon as he came to power, Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense, who issued an order to strengthen the "view on security" and "the view on the principal enemy" as guidelines for training the units of the puppet army this year and committed the above-said hideous crimes as part of the moves for implementing it and other military hooligans.
					
					 The DPRK will follow with high vigilance the attitude of the south Korean puppet authorities towards the recent hideous crimes.
					
					 2. The south Korean puppet authorities should make a formal apology to the whole nation for the hideous provocation and provide an official guarantee for thoroughly preventing its recurrence.
					
					  There can be neither excuse nor empty talk about the thrice- cursed crimes.
					
					 Today when the determination of the enraged KPA and people to make retaliation is running high, the puppet authorities should apologize to the nation for the evil deeds committed by traitor Lee Myung Bak and the puppet army hooligans and take a responsible step for their prevention. 
					
					 3. From now on the units of the three services of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards will launch practical and overall retaliatory military actions to wipe out the group of traitors at a stroke. 
					
					 It is the final conclusion drawn by the DPRK that there is no need to sit face to face with the Lee group of traitors hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow countrymen and that it is necessary to settle accounts with it only by force of arms. 
					
					 The despicable true colors of the group have already been laid bare. 
					
					 All the units of the three services of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards will escalate the practical and overall retaliatory military actions till the puppet authorities have taken measures to punish the prime movers for the recent cases and make an apology for them. 
					
					 The world will clearly witness what are the retaliatory actions to be taken by the whole army and all the people to protect the supreme dignity of the country and nation and what destiny will await Lee Myung Bak, the traitor for all ages, and the puppet military warmongers running wild without any fear.

articles.title: Chinese Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador Hosts Reception
						
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy Friday for officials of the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in connection with General Secretary Kim Jong Il's successful China visit.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C, the WPK, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Chinese embassy were present there.
					
					 Liu in a speech at the reception expressed the will to strive to develop friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, defend common interests and achieve regional peace and stability.
					
					 Kim Yong Il in his speech recalled that it is the steadfast stand of the WPK and the government of the DPRK to consolidate the ties of fraternal relations of friendship rooted in the minds of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Vietnamese Friendship Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Vietnamese Friendship Delegation Arrives
						
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of Vietnam led by Pham Tat Dong, chairman of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, arrived here Friday by air.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Opens
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the sports contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize was held at the Hyesan Stadium in Ryanggang Province, the DPRK on Friday. 
					 The participants will compete in more than thirty events including football, basketball, table tennis and marathon to be held in Pyongyang, Wonsan, Chongjin, Sariwon, Hamhung and other areas. 
					
					 The opening ceremony was followed by a football match.

articles.title: Mansudae Area in Pyongyang to Take on New Looks
articles.content:
Mansudae Area in Pyongyang to Take on New Looks 
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- There started the project to build on the best level the Mansudae area in Pyongyang where President Kim Il Sung's statue stands in the run-up to the centenary of his birth.
					 A monumental edifice, high-rise apartment houses, skyscraping buildings, public buildings and cultural and service facilities will appear as required by the new century in the vast area covering dozens of hectares where its old appearance will be no longer to be seen. 
					
					A new street will make its appearance as required by the modern sense of beauty, completely free from the existing mode of urban construction. 
					
					It will be unique in the formative artistic representation of architecture and the whole area will turn into a huge park. This is a new idea in the lay-out of the street in the area. 
					
					A round-shape big people's theater will spring up in the area of Mansu-dong.
					
					 Trees of good species and flowering plants will be planted in the more than ten hectare area around the theater facing the Mansudae Assembly Hall. Promenades and public service facilities will keep in good harmony.
					
					 The height of the high-rise apartment houses to be built in the area covering hundreds of thousands of square meters in Kyongsang-dong, Jongro-dong and Taedongmun-dong is expected to gradually increase and twin tower buildings will be concentrated in the area near the Changjon Intersection so that one can enjoy a bird-eye-view of rhythmic distribution of huge buildings on the street. 
					
					 A catering street will rise to face Okryu Restaurant and public buildings and cultural and service facilities of unique styles will be distributed to the convenience of the residents. They will be decorated with peculiar street lamps and diverse lights.
					
					 What draws attention in the lay-out of the streets is the fashionable appearance of high-rise and skyscraping apartment houses of peculiar styles, a harmonious combination of circular, semi-circular and angle style architecture.
					
					 The houses will have de luxe flats which will meet the cultural need of Pyongyangites.
					
					 When the construction of the Mansudae area completed, it will best match the monumental edifices including the Chollima Statue, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Monument to Party Founding, the Grand People's Study House and the Moranbong Theater and structures in the era of the Workers' Party including An Sang Thaek, An Sang Thaek Street, Munsu, Mansudae and Changwang streets. This will change the appearance of the capital city beyond recognition.

articles.title: Stimulant to Mushroom Growth Developed
articles.content:
Stimulant to Mushroom Growth Developed
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Microbiological Research Institute of the DPRK State Academy of Sciences developed a new stimulant to mushroom growth.
					 The stimulant, made by a microbiological method, contains various kinds of amino acids, vitamins and mineral matters needed to shorten the mushroom cultivation period, increase the production and improve quality. It gives no harmful effect to human body.
					
					 The stimulant is applicable to all processes of mushroom cultivation. 
					
					 Many units have already introduced it to cut the cultivation cycle by more than half a month, while raising yield by 30 percent.

articles.title: Ryongjon Fruit Farm
articles.content:
Ryongjon Fruit Farm
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Ryongjon Fruit Farm in South Hamgyong Province has turned into one of the country's major fruit producers.
					 The farm has built a new orchard covering hundreds of hectares and expanded nurseries in years. It has also built many dwelling houses.
					
					 The farm, with all necessary facilities for cultivation of saplings, produces tens of thousands of young dwarf apple trees annually.
					
					 It also has an air-conditioned fruit storehouse with the capacity of several dozen tons.
					
					 A gravity-fed irrigation system is working well in the farm.
					
					 The irrigation system is also used for applying fertilizers and agricultural chemicals to fruit trees.

articles.title: Inverter Technology Center
articles.content:
- Inverter Technology Center
						
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Inverter Technology Center, located in Central District, has developed up-to-date technologies necessary for economic sectors.
					 It, founded in Juche 86 (1997), makes scientific researches and develops technologies concerning power and electronic industries.
					
					 Inverter equipment like inverter welder, high-frequency furnace and uninterrupted power apparatus made by the center have proved effective in many factories and enterprises.  
					
					 In particular, the center developed a new kind of high-pressure inverter badly needed for iron and steel works and mines. 
					
					 Pak Min Chol, head of the center, told KCNA the center would intensify researches in inverter technologies to meet the ever-increasing demand for inverter equipment.

articles.title: Art Pieces Depicting Korean War
articles.content:
Art Pieces Depicting Korean War
						
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The exhibits of the Korean Art Gallery include art works representing Korean soldiers and civilians in the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					 Conspicuous among them are the oil painting "On the Road of Advance", Korean paintings "Old Boatman in Rakdong River", "Namgang Village Women" and "On the Road of Southward Advance".
					
					 "On the Road of Advance" portrays President Kim Il Sung meeting soldiers of the Korean People's Army on their way of southward advance.
					
					 The work, based on close relations between the supreme commander and his soldiers, shows that the President's outstanding strategy and tactics, wise leadership and deep care for the soldiers served as a source of their victory in battles against the U.S. imperialist invaders.
					
					 "Old Boatman in Rakdong River" depicts an old man of south Korea risking his life to ferry KPA soldiers across the river.
					
					 "Namgang Village Women" pictures women crossing the Nam River flowing in rapids. They lead cattle loaded with ripe rice sheaves, carrying rice sheaves on their heads and backs and holding rifles in their hands.   
					
					 "On the Road of Southward Advance" portrays soldiers drinking water offered by a woman with pleasure.
					
					 Tanks advancing southward, a DPRK flag fluttering on the roof of her thatched house and thick pumpkin leaves in the yard give a truthful picture of south Korean people's support for the DPRK and its soldiers, which was fully expressed throughout south Korea in the summer of 1950.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Army Unit in Afghanistan Attacked Again
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Army Unit in Afghanistan Attacked Again
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A unit of the south Korean puppet army present in Afghanistan came under a rocket attack of resistance forces in the country on May 31, south Korean MBC reported.
					 This was the ninth attack since the beginning of the year in the wake of one on May 16.

articles.title: US History of Unethical Crimes Slammed
articles.content:
US History of Unethical Crimes Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo on June 1 in an article held that the Korean nation will certainly force the U.S. to pay for its thrice-cursed crimes.
					 The U.S. committed genocide in south Korea without hesitation after partitioning Korea into two parts, the article noted, and continued: 
					
					 During the war GIs massacred civilians everywhere they went in the south and the north and vandalized cultural treasures of Koreans and even planned to use nukes.
					
					 Not content with this, the U.S. buried defoliant in its every military base in south Korea in secrecy and threw even toxic materials into the Han River, polluting environment to gravely threaten the life of the south Koreans. 
					
					 People are getting sick and dying in the land under the cursed U.S. forces' occupation but "the Grand National Party" and other ruling forces keep mum about this, the paper deplored.

articles.title: Anniversary of 6.15 Declaration Observed in Russia and Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Anniversary of 6.15 Declaration Observed in Russia and Democratic Congo 
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Russia and Democratic Congo carried special write-ups and articles on the occasion of the 11th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The May 27 issue of the Russian newspaper Nakhodkinski Rabochi carried a photo of leader Kim Jong Il signing the joint declaration and specially edited an article saying that he warmly received Kim Dae Jung, former south Korean president on a visit to Pyongyang, at the airport in June 2000 and the joint declaration was adopted and published.
					
					 Newspaper L'Avenir of Democratic Congo on May 25 carried an article titled "Immortal Banner for Korea's Reunification."
					
					 The idea of "By the Korean nation itself", the main spirit of the joint declaration, serves as an immortal banner of Korea's reunification because this idea fully reflects the transparent spirit of national independence and this also represents the great national unity, the premise and the basic way for reunification and provides a sure guarantee for defending peace.
					
					 In order to achieve the reunification of Korea there is no other way but to implement the joint declaration.

articles.title: Decision on Convening Juche Idea World Conference Hailed in Austria and Czech Republic
articles.content:
Decision on Convening Juche Idea World Conference Hailed in Austria and Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Austria and the Czech Republic expressed full support for the decision of the 13th enlarged meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					 The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria in its resolution on May 25 said that the world conference on the Juche idea to be convened on the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung would mark a significant occasion in praising the President, founder of the Juche idea and making a deeper study of the doctrine of the Juche idea.
					
					 The enlarged meeting greatly encourages the organization to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and expand the Juche idea study organization, the resolution said.
					
					 The Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea in a statement on May 26 said, fully supporting the decision on convening the conference:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a great activist of the international communist movement and labor movement.
					
					 To commemorate the centenary of his birth with splendor is the unanimous desire of the progressive people the world over.
					
					 We will activate the study and dissemination of the Juche idea, expand the ranks of its followers and energetically hold colorful political and cultural events on this occasion.

articles.title: Guinean Organizations Meet to Commemorate Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Guinean Organizations Meet to Commemorate Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Guinean Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea held a joint meeting in Conakry on May 27.
					 This was to support the decision of the senior officials' meeting of the International Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the decision of the 13th enlarged meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					The joint meeting discussed the action program including the matters of enhancing the role of each organization, widely introducing the feats of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il through media and holding diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun in 2012.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Marked in Nigeria and Mongolia
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Marked in Nigeria and Mongolia
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Nigeria and Mongolia on May 23 and 28 to mark the 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, at a seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism", said that Kim Jong Il scientifically proved through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities that the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, is the great guiding idea in the present times.
					
					 The chairman went on to say:
					
					 He proclaimed the programme for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea to consolidate as firm as a rock the WPK's cohesion and unity in thinking and purpose and defined the Songun politics as a strategic line and political mode under socialism that should be always held fast to.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the Korean people have won shining victory in defending socialism and building a thriving nation.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Literary College of Mongolia said at a seminar on Kim Jong Il's exploits: The DPRK has achieved big successes in building a thriving socialist nation under the banner of the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung. This is attributable to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and the WPK.

articles.title: President Hu Calls for Developing Strategic Emerging Industries
articles.content:
President Hu Calls for Developing Strategic Emerging Industries
						
 Beijing, June 1 (KCNA) -- Chinese President Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, called for developing strategic emerging industries. He said this in a speech made while presiding over a group study of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on Monday. 
					 To develop those industries is of weighty importance in achieving harmony and development of economy and society, building a comprehensively well-off society and accelerating the socialist modernization drive, he added.  
					
					 He underscored the need to widely introduce the scientific and technological achievements into industries and thus spur on the rapid progress of the above-said industries.

articles.title: Guo Calls for Discharging Historic Mission of Army
articles.content:
Guo Calls for Discharging Historic Mission of Army
						
 Beijing, June 1 (KCNA) -- Guo Boxiong, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the CPC, called for effectively discharging the historic mission of the Chinese army under the new situation. He made the remarks when inspecting the Shenyang battle area recently. 
					 He underlined the need to intensify the ideological and political construction, considering it as the main subject to promote the scientific development of the national defense and the army-building and retain a firm grip on carrying out all work, putting main emphasis on combat preparations.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Opens in Shanghai, China
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Opens in Shanghai, China
						
 Beijing, June 1 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition opened in Shanghai, China on May 27 on the occasion of the 90th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
					 Displayed there are at least 300 photos dealing with the 90 year- long history of the party and achievements made by Shanghai and various other parts of the country in the economic and social development.

articles.title: Chinese Police Intensifies Actions against Bank Card-related Crimes
articles.content:
Chinese Police Intensifies Actions against Bank Card-related Crimes
 Beijing, June 1 (KCNA) -- Chinese police have cracked more than 5,600 bank card-related fraud cases since the launch of a nationwide crackdown on the offenses in January, the Ministry of Public Security (MPS) said in a statement on Monday.
					 Police seized 25,800 bank cards during the crackdown, which targeted forgery, illegal withdrawals and fraudulent online payments, the statement said.

articles.title: Russia Introduces History of Korean Ceramic Manufacture
articles.content:
Russia Introduces History of Korean Ceramic Manufacture
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Korea's Long History of Ceramic Manufacture" was posted on the Internet homepage of the Ria-Soyuz Music Press Company of Russia.
					 The article said:
					
					 From olden times Koreans made ceramics by using the nature of clay hardening when heated.
					
					 Korean ceramics which rapidly developed during Koguryo was known worldwide during Koryo and Ri Dynasty.
					
					 Potters made peculiar ceramics rare to be seen in other countries in those days.
					
					 Referring in detail to the course of development of Korean ceramics and their advantages, the article went on:
					
					  Many experts on pottery of neighboring countries are learning the technique of ceramic manufacture in Korea. 
					
					 The Korean technique of ceramic manufacture made a great contribution to human civilization and cultural development.

articles.title: Russian PM Calls for Protecting Nature
articles.content:
Russian PM Calls for Protecting Nature
 Moscow, June 1 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin at a recent meeting referred to the issue of conserving nature. 
					 He stressed that it is important to develop infrastructure but it is necessary to direct primary attention to the work to protect the country's nature.

articles.title: Speaker of State Duma on Organizing Federal Coordinating Council of People's Front
articles.content:
Speaker of State Duma on Organizing Federal Coordinating Council of People's Front 
 Moscow, June 1 (KCNA) -- Boris Gryzlov, speaker of State Duma, at a press interview on May 27, referred to the work for organizing a federal coordinating council of the All-Russia People's Front. 
					 He said that this work has made brisk headway, adding that 30 social organizations would be involved in the work. 
					
					 The council would be reportedly made up of the organizations which have the widest-ranging regional missions and reflect the interests of citizens of different social circles.

articles.title: One More NATO Soldier Killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
One More NATO Soldier Killed in Afghanistan 
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of NATO soldiers are being killed in Afghanistan by attacks of resistance forces in the country. 
					 One more soldier of the NATO forces was killed by an attack of the resistance forces in southern Afghanistan on May 28.

articles.title: Damage by Smoking Remains Serious Worldwide
articles.content:
Damage by Smoking Remains Serious Worldwide
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Smoking poses a serious problem as various diseases caused by it are claiming huge casualties worldwide, 
					 According to a report released by WHO on May 27, the death toll caused by smoking is expected to reach about six million persons this year.

articles.title: Earthquake Jolts Indonesia
articles.content:
Earthquake Jolts Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- 6.3-magnitude earthquakes jolted Sumatra Island, Indonesia on May 29 and 30.
					 The epicenters were 119 km southwest of Lampung Province and 409 km southwest of Bengkulu Province.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Granja Frutícola de Kosan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Granja Frutícola de Kosan 
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, dirigió sobre el terreno la  Granja Frutícola de Kosan en el curso de remozamiento a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano perspectivo de esa base frutícola de gran dimensión, el Dirigente recorrió largamente varios puntos de ella averiguando los detalles de construcción.
					
					Evaluó altamente los méritos de los constructores diciendo que ellos transformaron de modo irreconocible la granja en un corto tiempo al acondicionar cientos de hectáreas de huertas modernas pese a las condiciones difíciles.
					
					Acto seguido, recorrió la estación de bombeo para la irrigación a chorros y la moderna fábrica de tejas, construidas recientemente en la granja.
					
					Informado del estado de riego a chorros, él elogió altamente a los constructores y empleados de la granja por haber dado la garantía científico-técnica del cultivo seguro de árboles frutales y del incremento de la producción de frutas mediante la introducción de ese moderno sistema.
					
					Durante su recorrido por la fábrica capaz de producir en grandes cantidades las tejas de diversos tipos como las normales, las inclinadas, las triangulares, las de caballete, etc. y los palos de sostén de árboles frutales, se mostró muy satisfecho por la construcción de esa magnífica base de materiales de construcción que conviene a las condiciones reales de la granja.
					
					Al presentar las tareas importantes a ser cumplidas por la granja, instruyó seguir impulsando la obra de ensanche de su capacidad y elevar los niveles de la cientifización, modernización e intensificación de la producción de frutas con la meta de desarrollar vertiginosamente la fruticultura conforme a la realidad en constante avance.
					
					Apuntando que el mejoramiento de la fertilidad de la tierra es el requisito principal de la producción cuantiosa de frutas de buena calidad, indicó que la granja construyera granjitas porcinas de mucha capacidad para abonar las huertas con más fertilizantes compuestos orgánicos.
					
					Prosiguió que la granja debe aplicar ampliamente  las tecnologías avanzadas realizando de modo científico-técnico el abonamiento y cuidado de árboles frutales.
					
					Esta granja debe usar eficientemente los equipos mecánicos existentes y disponer de mucho más máquinas agrícolas que sean eficientes en el cuidado de huertas, aseveró.
					
					Señaló que para suministrar sin ninguna pérdida al pueblo las frutas producidas en la granja, hay que cosechar a tiempo las manzanas, prestar profunda atención a la conservación de frutas y edificar nuevamente las bases de condensación y secado de ellas.
					
					El Dirigente fue acompañado en esta ocasión por Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buró Político y secretario del Comité Central del PTC, y Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envía mensaje a su homólogo lao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envía mensaje a su homólogo lao
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, envió este viernes un mensaje a Choummaly Saynasone, secretario general del Comité Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la República Democrática Popular Lao, para felicitarle por su 75º cumpleaños.
					La misiva señala:
					
					En ocasión del 75º aniversario de su cumpleaños, le hago llegar a Vd. mi calurosa felicitación y saludo camaraderil.
					
					Me siento alegre de que bajo la dirección del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao encabezado por Vd., el pueblo de vuestro país se levanta enérgicamente en la lucha por lograr el desarrollo socioeconómico del país en pleno acato a la resolución del IX Congreso del Partido. 
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresar la convicción de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperación entre nuestros dos partidos y dos países se ampliarán y se desarrollarán más en la lucha conjunta antiimperialista y por el socialismo y le deseo de todo corazón a Vd. buena salud y mayores éxitos en su trabajo responsable para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo del Partido y la prosperidad del país.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim averigua labor del Complejo Minero de Komdok
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim averigua labor del Complejo Minero de Komdok
						
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, Choe Yong Rim, averiguó en el terreno la labor del Complejo Minero de Komdok.
					Tras recorrer el taller de trituración, el de flotación y otros importantes procesos de producción del Complejo, convocó una reunión consultiva de los funcionarios correspondientes. 
					
					El foro discutió el problema de acelerar la modernización de los procesos productivos de esta magna base de producción de minerales, el de aumentar la producción de minerales mediante el desprendimiento y la evacuación de minerales en grandes cantidades y el de normalizar en alto nivel la producción aun en la estación de lluvias. 
					
					Además, tomó las medidas para proporcionar suficientemente la electricidad, los equipos y los materiales necesarios a la gestión del Complejo en el Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y órganos centrales.

articles.title: EMG declara tomar venganza sobre la peor provocaci?n del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
EMG declara tomar venganza sobre la peor provocación del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- En relación con la reciente provocación brutal de máxima gravedad cometida por la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos, el portavoz del Estado Mayor General (EMG) del Ejército Popular de Corea publicó este viernes la siguiente declaración:
					Últimamente, la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak instigó a sus esbirros bribones del ejército títere surcoreano a colocar en los campos de entrenamiento en distintas partes del Sur de Corea como Yangju y la ciudad de Inchon de la provincia de Kyonggi las consignas y otros materiales de propaganda que calumnian el sistema socialista de la República Popular Democrática de Corea.
					
					  Para colmo, ellos cometen una locura nunca perdonable de disparar sobre los blancos que ofenden la máxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					  Esta histeria fuera de la imaginación del hombre significa el clímax de la campaña de enfrentamiento fratricida que deja consternada a toda la nación coreana.
					
					  El año pasado, la camarilla del traidor Lee había desatado un gran escándalo al ejercitar el tiro de artillería tomando por blanco la bandera nacional de la RPDC.
					
					  Anteriormente, hubo en el Sur de Corea el dictador de "renovación", que se tornó connotado por su campaña de enfrentamiento fratricida, y el matón fascista militar que hizo temblar de indignación a la nación coreana. Ni ellos se habían atrevido a ofender la máxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					  Es que ellos sabían muy bien que la nación coreana considera la máxima dignidad de la RPDC como la dignidad y el honor comunes de sí misma y se levantaría unánimemente para defenderla aunque en ese curso caiga el cielo y se quiebre la Tierra. Estaban profundamente conscientes también de que si ellos desafían a esa dignidad, llegaría al colapso lo todo, inclusive las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					  Sin embargo, la banda de Lee Myung Bak demostró esta vez su origen de maníacos de confrontación fratricida, de los cuales se sentirían deshonrados hasta los anteriores fascistas surcoreanos, y de gángsteres que no conocen ni la elemental ética y moral.
					
					  En cuanto a esa provocación de máxima gravedad de la camarilla del traidor Lee que dejó de ser humano hace mucho tiempo, en el seno de los diferentes sectores del Sur de Corea suenan las voces que la denuncian como "imprudente provocación política" sin precedente que afrontará las protestas de toda la nación coreana.
					
					  Apretados por la situación dada, los compinches del traidor Lee se hacen el sueco mientras los belicistas del círculo militar títere orquestan una farsa barata circulando el rumor como si eso no se tratara de una medida organizada sino "acción de algunos individuos". Pero, ellos no podrán eludir en ningún caso su macro-crimen de traición concretado ya en hechos.
					
					Reflejando la indignación incontenible de nuestro ejército y pueblo y su unánime voluntad de tomar la venganza mil veces más fuerte, el Estado Mayor General del Ejército Popular de Corea expone la siguiente posición:
					
					1. Las autoridades títeres surcoreanas deben tomar la medida de castigar inmediata y severamente a los autores principales de ese crimen antinacional de pésima calaña. 
					
					Los que ofendieron, aunque en lo mínimo, nuestra dignidad máxima, no tienen ningún refugio en este territorio. 
					
					Las autoridades títeres deben condenar inmediatamente en nombre común de la nación al traidor Lee Myung Bak, que vino inculcando al frente el sentimiento hostil a la RPDC desde su llegada al poder, y a los bribones militares, incluso el ministro títere de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin, que instruyeron el afianzamiento de la "concepción de seguridad" y de "la de enemigo principal" a las unidades del ejército títere para este año y cometieron el presente crimen como un paso de su ejecución. 
					
					Seguiremos de cerca la actitud de las autoridades títeres surcoreanas sobre el presente caso. 
					
					2. Las autoridades títeres surcoreanas deben disculparse oficialmente ante toda la nación por su provocación de máxima gravedad y garantizar de igual manera la prevención de repetición. 
					
					El presente crimen no tiene justificación ni se alivia con excusas superficiales. 
					
					En estos momentos en que llega al clímax el ánimo de venganza de nuestro ejército y pueblo enardecidos, las autoridades títeres deben pedir perdón ante la nación por las fechorías del traidor Lee y los bribones militares y tomar las medidas responsables para prevenir la repetición. 
					
					3. Desde ahora, las unidades de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aéreas del Ejército Popular de Corea y las otras de la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina entrarán en la acción militar de venganza real y total para exterminar de un solo golpe a la horda de traidores. 
					
					No hace falta negociar con la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak enloquecido por la confrontación fratricida y hay que ajustar la cuenta final con ella sólo con las fuerzas armadas. He aquí la conclusión final que hemos sacado. 
					
					Ya quedó revelada la sucia fachada de la camarilla del traidor Lee.
					
					Todas las unidades de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aéreas del Ejército Popular de Corea y de la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina intensificarán gradualmente las acciones de venganza militar real y total hasta que las autoridades títeres tomen las medidas para castigar a los autores principales del caso y pedir perdón. 
					
					El mundo verá claramente cómo son las acciones de represalia de todos nuestros militares y civiles para defender la máxima dignidad del país y la nación y cómo será el destino del traidor Lee Myung Bak y los belicistas de la capa militar títere del Sur de Corea que se portan tan frívolamente sin ningún miedo.

articles.title: Zona de Mansudae cambiará de su fisonomía
articles.content:
Zona de Mansudae cambiará de su fisonomía
						
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ATCC) -- Se ha iniciado la obra de construcción de la zona de Mansudae, donde está erguida la estatua de bronce del Presidente   Kim Il Sung, para acondicionarla en el máximo nivel en ocasión del centenario de natalicio del Presidente.
					En la vasta área de decenas de hectáreas donde no se ve ni un rastro del aspecto original, se levantarán a las alturas del nuevo siglo los edificios monumentales, los apartamientos rascacielos, los edificios públicos y los establecimientos de servicio cultural. 
					
					Y se formará una nueva avenida conveniente al gusto de la época y desviada completamente del existente modo de construcción urbana.
					
					En el barrio Mansu se construirá el Anfiteatro del Pueblo de gran dimensión.
					
					En área de más de 10 hectáreas alrededores de este teatro frente al Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae se plantarán las plantas decorativas y los árboles de buenas especies y se distribuirán de manera armoniosa y acomodada los paseos y los establecimientos de servicios públicos. 
					
					Se aumentarán de manera escalonada los pisos de los apartamentos en la superficie de cientos de miles de metros cuadrados de los barrios Kyongsang, Jongno y Taedongmun y se levantarán los apartamentos gemelos de forma cilíndrica en el cruce de Changjon.
					
					En ese caso, desde la colina Mansu podrán contemplar los gigantescos edificios de esta avenida distribuidos rítmicamente. 
					
					Se formará allí también una avenida de servicios frente al Restaurante Okryu, se distribuirán racionalmente en las manzanas residenciales los edificios públicos e instalaciones de servicio cultural de formas particulares y se establecerán peculiarmente los alumbrados públicos y lamparillas decorativas.
					
					Lo más atractivo en la formación de la avenida es el aspecto lujoso de los apartamentos de forma circular, semicircular y cuadrada.
					
					El interior de las viviendas también se construirá moderna y acomodadamente de acuerdo con el nivel cultural de nuestro pueblo. 
					
					Cuando termina la construcción de la zona de Mansudae, los edificios monumentales como la Estatua de Chollima, el Monumento a la Idea Juche, el Monumento a la Fundación del Partido, el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo y el Teatro Moranbong se armonizarán más maravillosamente con las creaciones de la época del Partido del Trabajo como las avenidas Ansangthaek, Munsu, Mansudae y Changgwang.
